description: Numbers whose set of base 4 digits is {1,2}.
comments: Intersection of A023705 and A023717; A179888 is the intersection of this sequence and A053754. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 31 2010
links: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..1000] | Set(IntegerToSequence(n, 4)) subset {1, 2}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 05 2012(Haskell)import Data.List (transpose)a032925 n = a032925_list !! (n-1)a032925_list = 1 : 2 : (concat $ transpose [map (+ 1) fs, map (+ 2) fs])               where fs = map (* 4) a032925_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 18 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
